pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, February 5, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, February 5, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the welcome ceremony of the new Chief Justice of Canada, the Honourable Richard Wagner.

Supreme Court of Canada

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
